original_title: Kids Love Spanish: Volume 5 - Colors & Shapes
overview: This fun video teaches your children basic Spanish words they can use every day. Krisse, Julie, Brock, and friends will teach your children proper pronunciation. This video provides your child with essential building blocks for future language acquisition. Parents and teachers rave about how fun, easy, and useful thi video is for children of all ages!
title: Kids Love Spanish: Volume 5 - Colors & Shapes
